Package io.micronaut.core.serialize

Class JdkSerializer

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.core.serialize.JdkSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectSerializer
public class JdkSerializer extends Object implements ObjectSerializer
A ObjectSerializer that uses JDK serialization.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
